title: august 22: wildfires
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the historic California wildfires in summer 2020. After, Maia explains a legal feud between Pitbull and Lindsay Lohan. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
